version_description:
Enjoyed UEFA EURO 2016? Continue following your national team’s progress in the European Qualifiers.
This update provides a number of important improvements and bug fixes:

• Correctly display own goals in the match card
• Quicker synchronisation from subscribing to receiving push notifications for your favorite team or a match
• Photos in match feeds look much better now
• Improved contrast on the home feed to separate the cards from the background more clearly.

Enjoyed UEFA EURO 2016? Continue following your national team’s progress in the European Qualifiers.

Never miss a goal! With this update we are adding in-app notifications for matches being played at the same time. We also added an overview page to each of the team profiles and improved sharing on social networks.

In addition we addressed several bugs and under the hood improvements to make your experience even better.

Enjoyed UEFA EURO 2016? Continue following your national team’s progress in the European Qualifiers.

This update improves the stability during live matches and fixes an issue that prevented users from logging into their UEFA profile with their Google account.

This update improves the compatibility with iOS 10 and solves an issue in the match calendar that caused the application to crash. In addition, we fixed localisation and user interface errors.

Follow your national team’s progress in the European Qualifiers competition on their way to the FIFA Worldcup 2018!

This update solves an issue in the match calendar that prevented matches from displaying correctly.

Follow your national team’s progress in the European Qualifiers competition on their way to the FIFA Worldcup 2018!

This update brings improvements to the app’s stability by fixing a bug related to the UEFA.com account login. We have also made some tweaks under the hood that improve the connectivity of the app with our systems.

Stay tuned about your national team’s progress in the European Qualifiers competition on their way to the FIFA Worldcup 2018!

We have fixed the bug affecting some users’ experience of following live matches.

Follow your national team’s progress in the European Qualifiers competition on their way to the FIFA Worldcup 2018!

With this update we add the European Qualifiers play-off match dates to the application.

Follow your national team’s progress in the European Qualifiers competition on their way to the FIFA Worldcup 2018!

This update brings improvements to the display of penalties in the live match experience.

Follow your national team’s progress in the European Qualifiers competition on their last step towards the FIFA WorldCup 2018!
This update delivers a brand new app replacing the UEFA European Qualifications app and adding content from the UEFA Nations League and UEFA EURO 2020.
Performance improvements to the new UEFA national team competitions app. This app replaces the European Qualifiers app and adds content from the UEFA Nations League and UEFA EURO 2020.
Performance improvements to the new UEFA national team competitions app. This app replaces the European Qualifiers app and adds content from the UEFA Nations League and UEFA EURO 2020.
UEFA EURO 2020 match schedule and host city guides added
Match pages added including form guides and head-to-head records for every Nations League match
Team pages added with fixtures, results and form guides for all 55 European teams.

Update enables you to pick your favourite and followed teams. Get more of the content that matters to you with a customised home feed experience. Be the first to know about important goals and events by opting in for notifications about your teams and matches.
Update provides squad lists for each team, live match stats and TV broadcaster information.

This update introduces the following additions to your experience:
- Added more player information with player pages & player statistics
- More team statistics
- Now you can change the language of the app within the app by going to the Settings. Choose between English, French, German, Russian, Spanish, Italian and Portuguese.

This update introduces the following additions to your experience:
- Added more player information with player pages & player statistics
- More team statistics
- Now you can change the language of the app within the app by going to the Settings. Choose between English, French, German, Russian, Spanish, Italian and Portuguese.

This update provides:
- Fixes for reported bugs
- Performance improvements
- More detailed group standings when you rotate your phone to horizontal view

Update your app to get live coverage of the
- UEFA Nations League Finals draw
- European Qualifiers draw for UEFA EURO 2020
Follow live to see who your team will come up against.

Update your app to get live coverage of the
- UEFA Nations League Finals draw
- UEFA EURO 2020 qualifying draw
Follow live to see who your team will come up against.

Update your app to get live coverage of the
- UEFA Nations League Finals draw
- European Qualifiers draw for UEFA EURO 2020
Follow live to see who your team will come up against.
Update your app for the new UEFA Nations League statistics section. See who the top performing teams and players were during the group stage.

Update to ensure you get the latest ticket information and updates for UEFA EURO 2020 and the UEFA Nations League. This update also lets you login to your UEFA account to synchronise your favourite team selection.

Update to ensure you get the latest ticket information and updates for UEFA EURO 2020 and the UEFA Nations League. This update also lets you login to your UEFA account to synchronise your favourite team selection.

Thank you for all the great reviews and suggestions. We’ve added lineup formations to matches, and comparison stats to player and team screens to allow you to compare stats versus team and player averages. In addition this update significantly reduces the file size of the app.

Thank you for all the great reviews and suggestions. We’ve added lineup formations to matches, and comparison stats to player and team screens to allow you to compare stats versus team and player averages. In addition this update significantly reduces the file size of the app.
Get ready for the European Qualifiers for UEFA EURO 2020 with this app update. Plus, discover the top performing players with our new player ranking feature.
Get ready for the European Qualifiers for UEFA EURO 2020 with this app update. Plus, discover the top performing players with our new player ranking feature.
Get ready for the European Qualifiers for UEFA EURO 2020 with this app update. Plus, discover the top performing players with our new player ranking feature.
This update delivers improvements and bug fixes.
Update your app to get the latest info on UEFA EURO 2020 ticket applications and to register your interest.
Update your app to get the latest info on UEFA EURO 2020 ticket applications and to register your interest.

Get ready for the UEFA Nations League Finals. This update provides everything you need to follow all the matches and vote for the goal of the tournament.

Plus if you are going to a match you will find everything you need to get around the city: a journey planner, helpful daily tips, and important event and travel notifications.

Get ready for the UEFA Nations League Finals. This update provides everything you need to follow all the matches and vote for the goal of the tournament.

Plus if you are going to a match you will find everything you need to get around the city: a journey planner, helpful daily tips, and important event and travel notifications.

Get ready for the UEFA Nations League Finals. This update provides everything you need to follow all the matches and vote for the goal of the tournament.

Plus if you are going to a match you will find everything you need to get around the city: a journey planner, helpful daily tips, and important event and travel notifications.

Get ready for the UEFA Nations League Finals. This update provides everything you need to follow all the matches and vote for the goal of the tournament.

Plus if you are going to a match you will find everything you need to get around the city: a journey planner, helpful daily tips, and important event and travel notifications.
Thanks for all the great feedback. This update delivers some bug fixes.

With less than one year to go until UEFA EURO 2020 we have updated the app name and appearance. It’s now even easier to get the latest on the European Qualifier matches and EURO 2020 news and promotions.

The next European Qualifier matches start on 5 September. Update your app to get the very latest content and bug fixes. Plus: Your Move - vote for the freestylers who will represent your host city at UEFA EURO 2020.
Update your app to get the very latest content and bug fixes.
Update your app to get the very latest content and bug fixes.
Update for EURO 2020 match ticket info.
Update your app to get the very latest content and bug fixes.
Update to get a brand new feature that lets you pick and share your top 3 from the performance zone player ranking.

20 teams have secured their place at EURO 2020. Update to get:
- live coverage of the draw on 30 November
- the latest on the next round of match ticket sales
- a new dedicated section for match ticket holders and host city residents to discover the full EURO experience

The draw for UEFA EURO 2020 has been made, the fixtures are known and the excitement is building. Update now to:
- browse EURO 2020 match pages
- be ready for the next round of match ticket sales starting 4 December
This update contains important bug fixes for fans buying tickets and attending UEFA EURO 2020.
This update contains important bug fixes and improvements.

Update for the latest ticket sales info and important bug fixes

Update includes an improved profile area with dark mode and other ways to customise your app.
Update for the latest ticket sales info and important bug fixes
The UEFA EURO 2020 match schedule is confirmed. Update now for improvements and bug fixes
The UEFA EURO 2020 match schedule is confirmed. Update now for improvements and bug fixes

It's UEFA Nations League time! To get ready for kick-off, we've switched the app focus to the Nations League. Get live minute-by-minute updates from all the matches, highlights, team news, stats and more.

Plus all the UEFA EURO 2020 matches, event guides and news are still available in the same app.

Get ready for the next round of UEFA Nations League matches and the play-off semi-finals for UEFA EURO 2020! Live minute-by-minute updates from all the matches, highlights, team news, stats and more.

Plus the UEFA EURO 2020 schedule, event guides and news are available in the same app.

Follow the final round of UEFA Nations League matches and the play-off finals for UEFA EURO 2020! Live minute-by-minute updates from all the matches, highlights, team news, stats and more.

Plus a new ‘add to calendar’ feature that lets you add the UEFA EURO 2020 schedule to your phone calendar.

Follow the final round of UEFA Nations League matches and the play-off finals for UEFA EURO 2020! Live minute-by-minute updates from all the matches, highlights, team news, stats and more.

Plus a new ‘add to calendar’ feature that lets you add the UEFA EURO 2020 schedule to your phone calendar.

The final 24 teams have qualified and EURO 2020 is now just a matter of months away. To get ready for kick-off, we’ve switched the app focus to UEFA EURO 2020. Get the full match schedule, ticket news and build up as the teams prepare for the tournament.

The final 24 teams have qualified and EURO 2020 is now just a matter of months away. To get ready for kick-off, we’ve switched the app focus to UEFA EURO 2020. Get the full match schedule, ticket news and build up as the teams prepare for the tournament.
Update your app for the UEFA Nations League finals and European Qualifiers draws. Get ready to find out who your team will play.
Update your app to get enhanced stats for every match and app performance improvements.
This update contains important bug fixes for fans buying tickets and attending UEFA EURO 2020.
The European Qualifiers for the 2022 FIFA World Cup begin in March. Update your app to follow all the matches.
The European Qualifiers for the 2022 FIFA World Cup begin in March. Update your app to follow all the matches.
The European Qualifiers for the 2022 FIFA World Cup begin in March. Update your app to follow all the matches.

EURO 2020 will take place between 11 June and 11 July 2021. Whether you’re planning to go to a game or follow from home, update your app for all the latest information about the tournament, teams and players.

EURO 2020 will take place between 11 June and 11 July 2021. Whether you’re planning to go to a game or follow from home, update your app for all the latest information about the tournament, teams and players.

Get closer to the EURO action with the official UEFA EURO 2020 app.
In this version, you can now play the official Fantasy Football and Tournament Predictor games on your EURO 2020 app – completely free of charge.

Get unrivalled access to EURO 2020 with the official app.
The latest version includes new features, performance enhancements and bug fixes.
- Select your own squad from Europe’s finest with the Fantasy Football game
- Get an interactive guide and exclusive fan features for your host city

Whether you’re going to a game or following from home, update your app today for the best experience!
